spells.name: Antipathy
spells.description: Object or location affected by spell repels certain creatures.

spells.name: Regenerate
spells.description: Subject's severed limbs grow back, cures 4d8 damage +1/level (max +35).

spells.name: Shambler
spells.description: Creates 1d4+2 shambling mounds to fight for you.

spells.name: Shapechange
spells.description: Transforms you into certain creatures, and you can change forms once per round.

spells.name: Storm of Vengeance
spells.description: Storm rains acid, lightning, and hail.

spells.name: Sympathy
spells.description: Object or location attracts certain creatures.
